meanings.definition: Having or involving multiple senses or aspects.
meanings.sent1: The multisense experience of the art exhibit captivated the visitors.
meanings.sent2: The multisense movie included 3D visuals, surround sound, and even scents.
meanings.sent3: The multisense garden was so colorful and fragrant that it felt like stepping into a dream.
meanings.sent4: Her multisense approach to storytelling painted vivid pictures in the minds of her readers.
meanings.sent5: The multisense fireworks show dazzled the crowd with its bright lights and booming sounds.

meanings.definition: Capable of being interpreted in more than one way.
meanings.sent1: The multisense painting left viewers pondering its various possible meanings.
meanings.sent2: His multisense remarks during the speech sparked different interpretations among the audience.
meanings.sent3: The multisense riddle was so tricky that it had everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: The multisense metaphor in the poem added layers of depth to its overall message.
meanings.sent5: Her multisense facial expressions made it hard to tell if she was happy or sad.
